5619.verse: نَّحْنُ|We,|62|76|103$خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ|created them|109|137|14580$وَشَدَدْنَآ|and We strengthened|163|191|14793$أَسْرَهُمْ‌ۖ|their forms,|96|124|17697$وَإِذَا|and when|84|112|96$شِئْنَا|We will,|71|85|7000$بَدَّلْنَآ|We can change|123|195|6623$أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ|their likeness[es]|133|277|15752$تَبْدِيلاً|(with) a change.|131|203|13986$

5622.verse: يُدْخِلُ|He admits|85|103|12002$مَن|whom|58|93|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|104|867$فِى|to|48|83|89$رَحْمَتِهِۦ‌ۚ|His mercy,|98|133|6470$وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|but (for) the wrongdoers,|190|208|17699$أَعَدَّ|He has prepared|128|177|4407$لَهُمْ|for them|76|174|98$عَذَابًا|a punishment|108|206|2933$أَلِيمَۢا|painful.|68|117|17700$

5623.verse: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَـٰتِ|By the ones sent forth,|175|359|17701$عُرْفًا|one after another,|142|326|17702$

5625.verse: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٲتِ|And the ones that scatter|194|386|17705$نَشْرًا|far and wide,|107|299|17706$

5626.verse: فَٱلْفَـٰرِقَـٰتِ|And those who separate|182|364|17707$فَرْقًا|(by the) Criterion,|140|322|17708$

5627.verse: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَـٰتِ|And those who bring down|196|379|17709$ذِكْرًا|(the) Reminder,|123|306|1781$

5629.verse: إِنَّمَا|Indeed, what|108|186|102$تُوعَدُونَ|you are promised|133|290|6059$لَوَٲقِعٌ|will surely occur.|131|209|16111$

5633.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|135|96$ٱلرُّسُلُ|the Messengers|124|224|3325$أُقِّتَتْ|are gathered to their appointed time.|267|317|17715$

5636.verse: وَمَآ|And what|83|101|46$أَدْرَٮٰكَ|will make you know|147|184|17213$مَا|what|53|90|262$يَوْمُ|(is the) Day|99|136|5399$ٱلْفَصْلِ|(of) the Judgment?|147|165|14586$

5639.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|132|293$نُتْبِعُهُمُ|We follow them up|143|301|17719$ٱلْأَخِرِينَ|(with) the later ones.|163|242|12970$

5639.verse: vum~a⚓Then⚓CONJ|LEM:vum~★nutobiEuhumu⚓We follow them up⚓ V|IMPF|(IV)|LEM:>atobaEa|ROOT:tbE|1P★{lo'aAxiriyna⚓(with) the later ones.⚓ N|LEM:A^xir|ROOT:Axr|MP|ACC★

5617.verse: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.

5618.verse: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.

5619.verse: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.

5620.verse: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.

5621.verse: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

5622.verse: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

5623.verse: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

5624.verse: And the winds that blow violently

5627.verse: And those [angels] who deliver a message

5629.verse: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.

5630.verse: So when the stars are obliterated

5631.verse: And when the heaven is opened

5632.verse: And when the mountains are blown away

5633.verse: And when the messengers' time has come...

5634.verse: For what Day was it postponed?

5636.verse: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?

5637.verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

5638.verse: Did We not destroy the former peoples?

5639.verse: Then We will follow them with the later ones.

5640.verse: Thus do We deal with the criminals.

5641.verse: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
